english.segment1: I took a walk down a country road. I know this might sound dumb maybe. But I was all alone
english.segment2: If you think that I'm going somewhere. Take me hand I'll lead you there. Don't want to have to call you up from a pay phone
english.segment3: It's a long and lonely road. It's a long and lonely road. If you don't like it. Then you don't take it. It's a long and lonely road
english.segment4: I took a walk down a country road. I know this might sound dumb maybe. But I was all alone
english.segment5: If you think that I'm going somewhere. Take me had I'll lead you there. Don't want to have t call you up from a pay phone
english.segment6: I know it is so hard for you and I to be apart. I'm slowly fading, you're my lady. That keeps me moving on
english.segment7: It's a long and lonely road. It's a long and lonely road. If you don't like it. Then please don't take it. It's a long and lonely road
english.segment8: Honest promise you will be missed
